H0.text: What was the first name of the father of the Bronte sisters. Patrick

H1.text: What was the first name of the father of the Bronte sisters. John

H2.text: What was the first name of the father of the Bronte sisters. Michael

H3.text: What was the first name of the father of the Bronte sisters. Patrik

A4.text: Patrick Brontë (, commonly ; born Patrick Brunty; 17 March 1777 – 7 June 1861) was an Irish Anglican priest and author who spent most of his adult life in England.
